content: this tunisian crochet pillow pattern features a bold colorful design inspired by final fantasy which i assembled from different pixel art cross stitch and perler bead charts a cactuar and a chocobo worked in tunisian simple stitch it consists of two colorwork panels that are joined to create a 45 × 45 cm 17 7 × 17 7 in pillow cover a zipper can be added at the bottom or all sides can be grafted closed includes full color charts for both sides yardage approximate yellow 160 g green 140 g black 40 g gray 15 g white 10 g orange 10 g blue 1 g
